column1: Chanri and Boipelo are going on an adventure around South Africa. Their journey starts in Kimberley
column2: in the Northern Cape. In Kimberley you will find the Big Hole! Tjoeke puff toot-toot
column3: they travel to Cape Town in the Western Cape. Chanri and Boipelo pick juicy grapes at the farms. Tjoeke puff toot-toot
column4: then they head off to Bhisho
column5: in the Eastern Cape. The two friends have fun at the Elephant Park! Tjoeke puff toot-toot
column6: they pass through the Free State. They admire all the pretty roses blooming in Bloemfontein. On to Mahikeng
column7: in the North West. The train slows down to meet Rina the rhino at the National Park. Then our friends speed on to Polokwane
column8: in Limpopo. Toot-toot toot-toot! They're running late
column9: so the train doesn't stop in Johannesburg
column10: Gauteng. From the train they see many cars and people in this busy city of gold.
